item.title: Cannibalism in myth and Mycenan Greece
item.description: Archaeologists now shy away from rationalising myths. Explaining myths as garbled memoriesof real avents and peoplewas once a cmmon approach graph TD; A-->B; A-->C; B-->D; C-->D;
